attributes.action:
Form a Parish Council for the borough
Of Thurrock
attributes.background: Start a petition to form a Parish Council for the Borough of Thurrock

rejection.details:
You may wish to contact your local authority. Find out who your local authority is here: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council

More information about setting up parish councils is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/get-involved/take-part/set-up-a-town-or-parish-council
